Package gw.api.admin

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PublicZoneFinder
    Finder for zones.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityPatternFilterSet
    The filter set for the ActivityPatternsLV listview, used to display a list of activity patterns in the Admin UI.
    ActivityPatternFilterSet.CategoryFilter
    Filters out all activity patterns that do not belong to a particular category.
    ActivityPatternsUtil
    Utilities for the ActivityPatterns administration page.
    AdminTreeNodeFactory
    Class description...
    AdminUtil
    Utility functions for the Admin screens.
    AggregateLimitHelper
    UI helper object that caches coverage lines on the pages that create and edit aggregate limits.
    AggregateLimitUtil
    Utilities for the AggregateLimit pages.
    AttributeSearchCriteria
    Stores a user's search criteria when searching for attributes.
    BaseAdminUtil
    Utility methods for working with objects in the Admin area of Guidewire's applications.
    BaseAdminUtil.ExportQuery
    Conditions to select set of entity instances for export.
    CatastropheUtil
    Utilities for Catastrophes
    CCAdminTreeNodeFactory
    Class description...
    CCGroupTreeNode  
    CCOrganizationTreeNode
    Class description...
    DecentralizedAdminActivityPatternFilter
    Filter for activity patterns for decentralized admin.
    DecentralizedAdminFilter
    Filter for decentralized admin for a generic entity.
    DecentralizedAdminRoleFilter
    Filter for roles for an decentralized admin.
    DestinationMessageStatistics
    Represents statistics about messages in the Guidewire messaging system (see the Integration Guide for details of messaging).
    DestinationMessageStatisticsUtil
    Utilities for retrieving DestinationMessageStatistics objects, to display the status of messaging destinations to the user.
    DisplayableComparableCollection
    An object that represents a displayable, comparable collection of comparable objects.
    EventMessage
    Information about a single message in the Guidewire messaging system (see the Integration Guide for details of messaging).
    ExportDataInfo
    Maintains a data set to be exported.
    GroupPickerTreeNode
    Class description...
    GroupTreeNode
    Class description...
    GroupUserUtil
    Utility methods for manipulating a user's groups.
    GroupUtil
    Utility method for creating groups.
    ImportDataArrayDifferences
    Represents the differences between the imported and the original values of a particular array field on an entity.
    ImportDataConflict
    Represents the fields that have changed on an entity as the result of a data import.
    ImportDataFieldConflict
    Represents the difference between the imported and the original value of a particular field on an entity.
    ImportDataInfo
    Information about the import of an XML data file.
    MessageDestinationInfo
    General information about a message destination.
    MessageDestinationInfo.DestinationAction  
    MessagingUtil
    Provides utility functions supporting messaging admin screens.
    OrganizationTreeNode
    The Tree Node class that implements the representation of the Organization tree.
    PublicRoleFinder
    Finder methods for Roles.
    RegionSearchCriteria
    Stores a user's search criteria when searching for regions.
    RootTreeNode
    PC implementation of the Organization Tree Node
    SafeOrderedObjectMessageStatistics
    Data object used to encapsulate messaging statistics for messages related to a particular "ordering object" (such as a claim).
    SOOMessageFilters
    Helper class containing display filters for selecting messages based on status.
    SOOMessageFilters.FilerSetClass  
    SOOMessageStatisticsUtil
    Helper class used to retrieve messaging statistics for a message destination.
    TreeGroupInfo
    Used to represent a node in the tree view that displays groups and users on the team pages.
    UnassignedUsersGroup
    Class description...
    UnassignedUsersGroupNode
    Class description...
    UserAttributeUtil
    Utilities for the administrative UI for creating attributes.
    UserAuthorityLimitUtil
    Utilities for the user authority limit UI.
    UserContactHandle
    A wrapper around a User which provides the ContactHandle interface, so the User can be used by any PCF file or rule that expects a ContactHandle.
    UserRegionUtil
    Utilities for the administrative UI for creating regions.
    WorkflowUtil
    Web utilities for dealing with workflows from PCF files.
    ZoneAutocompleteHandler
    Zone autocomplete handler
    ZoneSearchCriteria Deprecated
    Replaced by gw.api.admin.PCZoneSearchCriteria.gs in PolicyCenter 8.0.
